name: Planetary Robot
description:
This is a game made for the Ludum Dare #38 in team mode!

You are controlling a little robot and your objective in the game is to avoid the incoming aliens, just jumping over them, not colliding.

Compete for the highest score and challenge your friends to see who is the best robot runner of all!

- INSTRUCTIONS -

- Move by the menu using "wasd" or the arrows of the keyboard and select an menu using "Space" or "Return".

- Use "W", "Space" or "Up arrow" to jump in the game! And use "S" or "Down arrow" to fall faster when jumping.

That's all! Hope you have fun. Feel free to leave a comment and show your opinion.
